messages.messageBody:
hmm, ok. My dad said there was a Nancy Dodd who was a nurses aid at
Grant mid school while I went there...

Joylyn

> Sandra

<< Don't fridge it until it's roasted, keep it in the
burlap bag, in a box. >>

Okay.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Green chile WAS Good TV programs
messages.msgSnippet: Sandra, is your mom s name Nancy? Joylyn ... Yes, you can ship it or take it on a plane.  I d bring it fresh and roast it afterwards.  Don t fridge it until
messages.messageBody:
Sandra, is your mom's name Nancy?

Joylyn

SandraDodd@... wrote:

>
> In a message dated 8/8/03 3:42:00 PM, kbcdlovejo@... writes:
>
> << Can you bring some? Huh? Huh? Do they travel well? It would tickle
> my dad
> to
> death!
>
> And I wouldn't mind trying some either! >>
>
> I could bring some fresh and we could roast it at your house. But we're
> going to the hotel first.
>
> I think they'll let people bring it on the plane.

Yes, you can ship it or take it on a plane. I'd bring it fresh and
roast it afterwards. Don't fridge it until it's roasted, keep it in the
burlap bag, in a box.

Joylyn who travels with chili

>
>
> If I brought roasted it would smell up the plane.
>
> I will think upon this problem. Fresh to a refrigerator for a few
> days and
> roasting after conference maybe...
>
> Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Green chile WAS Good TV programs
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/8/03 3:42:00 PM, kbcdlovejo@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/8/03 3:42:00 PM, kbcdlovejo@... writes:

<< Can you bring some? Huh? Huh? Do they travel well? It would tickle my dad
to
death!

And I wouldn't mind trying some either! >>

I could bring some fresh and we could roast it at your house. But we're
going to the hotel first.

I think they'll let people bring it on the plane.

If I brought roasted it would smell up the plane.

I will think upon this problem. Fresh to a refrigerator for a few days and
roasting after conference maybe...

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Green chile WAS Good TV programs
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/8/2003 5:25:05 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Can you bring some? Huh? Huh? Do they travel well? It would tickle my dad to death! And I
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/8/2003 5:25:05 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> People from New Mexico already know what I was seeing.
>
> Green chile season is coming! And they will be roasting green chile in many
>
> parking lots to seel right there, fresh roasted, over propane fires. <g>

Can you bring some? Huh? Huh? Do they travel well? It would tickle my dad to
death!

And I wouldn't mind trying some either!

~Kelly
